children.name: title
children.label: Title
children.default: Elegant solutions made for fire and for sitting fireside.

children.name: card_body
children.label: Body
children.default: There's nothing quite like the pleasure of gathering friends and family in your own luxurious outdoor living space. With Kindred Outdoor & Surrounds, there are a number of ways to create your very own personal retreat ranging from elegant fire bowls to inviting seating walls to beautiful outdoor kitchens. Kindred Outdoor & Surrounds seamlessly marries design and functionality making it easier than ever to create your memorable space.
